summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 40th Ave. Southwest from Southwest 98th St. to Southwest 102nd St.; and certain other streets, avenues, easements and alleys; by constructing a sanitary sewer system and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8155 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
